metoffice.title: Yellow warning of rain affecting South West England
metoffice.summary: Yellow warning of rain affecting South West England: Bournemouth Christchurch and Poole, Dorset, Somerset, Wiltshire valid from 1800 Mon 02 Feb to 1800 Tue 03 Feb

heat.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.

cold.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.
